segments.text: I notice the open window letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there drying dishes peacefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the sink overflowing massively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down like a waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's right in it and doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on that shaky two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to get into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, excited for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, making everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside view is so serene in contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the potential mess ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR
